    @allure.title("Validate the sample limits of Nitrosamine residue verification for direct bop")
    @allure.description("This test case tests API to Create Protocol for Nitrosamine residue verification and validate "
                        "the sample limits when select based on policy for direct")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86cumc4wx")  # bop = based on policy
    @pytest.mark.validate_nitrosamine_residue_sample_limits_direct_indirect_bop
    def test_validate_nitrosamine_residue_sample_limits_direct_indirect_bop(self):
        data = self.test_create_protocol_nitrosamine_residue_verification_based_on_policy()
        equipments_id = self.protocol_common_method.get_protocol_equipments_ids(data)
        for i in equipments_id:
            data.update({"equipment": i["equipment_id"], "external_id": i["external_id"],
                         "columns": self.EXCELS_COLUMNS,
                         "sample_type": "Nitrosamine", "bop_type": "based_on_policy"})
            get_sample_limits = \
                self.protocol_common_method.get_sample_limits_protocol_residue_verification_protocol(data)[
                    "response"]
            sample_limits = json.loads(get_sample_limits)["result"]
            data.update({"sample_profile": sample_limits})
